name: Euphoria Beats
summary: Euphoria Beats VR is an immersive rhythm-based VR game that lets you dance your way through vibrant environments. Featuring Casual Mode, players can groove freely in two unique settings: the neon-lit Pub Dance Floor, exuding lively social vibes, and the surreal Abstract Space, a dreamlike world of glowing shapes and dynamic colors. With first-person gameplay and beat-synced visuals, Euphoria Beats VR offers a relaxing, expressive experience for players of all skill levels.
